Reviews.Title: “Amazing stay, So central!”
Reviews.Author: Ryan T
Reviews.Content: We arrived at this Hotel unsure on much about it. When we arrived it was so amazingly central in Madrid, we could access everything. The Main Metro line 'Sol' was a mere 150 yard walk around the corner. The rooms were clean and the Air Con was great. A very modern hotel that I would recommend to anyone. Staff were friendly and efficient.

Reviews.Title: “Surprise surprise surprise”
Reviews.Author: Aini_1972
Reviews.Content: Good location, with just a few steps from Puerto de Sol, we are surprised with the conditions of the hostal. We took two rooms for 4 of us and both the rooms are spacious with nice black and white decor, clean with amenities including a mini fridge. The rooms and the toilets are clean with towels changed daily. Since we arrived early, we were happy that we were given 1 room to check in immediately. The reception was also helpful, assisting us to book for our flamenco show and to call for a taxi early in the morning for our next destination. Breakfast came together with the room price and served in a neraby cafe. The hostal is centrally located and you can walk through the shopping districts from Puerto de sol to Gran Via and Plaza Mayor, you can walk to most of the tourist attrctions, including Museo del Prado. Thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: “Hosta Alhambra Suites. Pretty Good.”
Reviews.Author: pkou
Reviews.Content: At first it looked like some scary, dodgy, ally way hotel, but when you walk inside it is pretty cool. Good location, quite central, easy to get around. Takes on a vintage yet modern day stylish look. Bedroom was good sized. Interior was pretty nice through out the hostal. The man at the front service desk was really nice and provided very good service, however when we left he was quite anal due to stress. Really horrible view though.

Reviews.Title: “unique..”
Reviews.Author: traveletsy
Reviews.Content: everything was nice, decor, service, breakfast was off at a small restaurant on a street nearby, but it was wonderful breakfast.. one thing i'd do next time is to bring a pair of slipers for the room, it was cold in Madrid ard 0 deg C, floor was cold, and we were bare feet in the room & toilet.. overall, good value for a pleasant stay in a perfect location!

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: NF2010
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Hostal for 4 nights and overall it was very pleasant. The best about the hotel I would say is the location, since its close to pretty much everything we wanted to see and we barely used public transportation. Also the rooms are modern and very clean. The things we disliked were mostly the noise, in the morning we could hear the showers of the rooms closer to ours and hear people in the hall with theis suitcases leaving the hotel. We also didn't enjoy the breakfast too much. It was served it a restaurant very close by but it wasn't continetal style, we had to ask for coffee and toast. The staff was helpfull except when we tried to get a recomendation for a good restaurant to eat a good spanish meal. They would only recomend the restaurant where we had breakfast, even knowing it wasnt even spanish. Guess they must have a deal with them. So even after we told them we had already dinned there, they would keep saying to go there again. Overall we enjoyed our stay and would recomend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great hostel right on plaza del sol”
Reviews.Author: ksigpaul
Reviews.Content: Amazing location and amazing accommodations. We had a room we three double beds and the toilet and shower were in separated and still in our room which really helps when traveling with friends. Mini fridge really helped keep our baby milk cold as well. We really liked this place.

Reviews.Title: “Two thumbs up!”
Reviews.Author: jjua543
Reviews.Content: What a great find!!! Really enjoyed this hotel. It's really steps away from Plaza del Sol and even closer to great food and fun places. We booked this hotel two days before we arrived in Madrid for the last two nights of our two week vacation to Spain. The hotel was very clean and kept in nice condition. The room was very spacious, bathroom modern. The balcony great for people watching. Staff very friendly. Breakfast was included in the hotel rate and was off site at an restaurant just around the corner. A choice of a large sandwich and selection of fruit and cheese as well as Coffee and fresh OJ was plenty for a good start to the day. Next time you are in Madrid and want to stay at a great place steps away from all of the action, stay here. You'll love it.

Reviews.Title: “Great Find”
Reviews.Author: majmaj4
Reviews.Content: The location is perfect, with nearly everything in walking distance. The room was clean and comfortable. modern furniture, modern bathroom, nice thick towels. This was a very modern clean and friendly hotel. I was very pleasantly surprise that it was such a nice room for a great price. Liked — Location, modern bathroom, and furniture, towels Disliked — bad tv reception, and no non-spanish channels. Tips - use the entry at no 8. the one at number 6, although there is a sign it is inconvenient to enter.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, cheap, clean”
Reviews.Author: Johnny_V_30483
Reviews.Content: Went to Madrid last June on a fast 4-day trip to see all that I could. Searched previously for places to stay on the net and this one came up. The staff is great and very patient with the guests, the rooms are very clean and the staff always cleans them in the morning. I was searching for a single room but instead ended up on a double bed room. Didn't mind because I got the most quiet room on the hostal! Overall it was good, everything smelled clean, and though the hostal needs a little "facelift" could you get a great clean bedroom with breakfast included in Madrid for less than 38€?? Loved it, if I go to Madrid again definitely booking a room there.

Reviews.Title: “An excelent experience”
Reviews.Author: studnttravlr
Reviews.Content: The location is perfect, with nearly everything in walking distance, the room was clean and comfortable, and the owner and staff are friendly and pacient with non-native speakers. If I come back to Madrid, this is the only establishment that I will consider.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and extremely clean”
Reviews.Author: tuxedobob
Reviews.Content: The rooms at the hotel were exceptionally clean, the beds were very comfortable, the staff were all very helpful and spoke English. We found this hostale through a website called Madridman . The hostale is in a great location, right by the Sol metro stop on a small street. While it is right in the heart of the "Party Zone" the street was not too noisy, though if you can get one at the back of the hotel you will not hear any sound at all.As a family travelling together this was a great hotel for anyone that is doing it on a budget. Our kids, who are 14 and 11, never had a problem with the room. I have stayed in far worse hotels that are ratty and far more expensive. This was just great. We actually extended our stay from 4 nights to 9 nights, after we decided that the hotel was better than we had expected and that we could use Madrid as a base for days trips to Avila, Segovia and Toledo. Four of us stayed in a room that could sleep 5, the price was $84 including tax and breakfast - which was at a small cafe around the corner.
